Name: Clash Memory Game
About the game: Clash Memory Game - the game 'Find a Pair', train your reaction and visual memory, open cards in a new exciting game with more than 30 game levels, with beautiful drawings, each of which opens if you have time for a limited time to reveal all the cards in the right pair! Feature of game: - Find A Pair - Visual style - 10 Arts - 31 levels - Skills development
